text: Wii Music is a music video game that was made by Nintendo for the Wii game console. It was supervised by Kōji Kondō along with others. ==References== Category:2008 video games Category:Casual games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Music video games Category:Nintendo video games Category:Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Wii games Category:Wii-only games Category:Wii Wi-Fi games
title: Wii Music
